channel.title: Can\'t build Sample App for iPhone – Politepix

item.title: Can\'t build Sample App for iPhone
item.dc:creator: weavercs
item.description: I downloaded the code and after some work got it to compile but won’t link. It says “file was built for unsupported file format”. It is trying to compile for the simulator. I have both the OpenEars and Slt frameworks.

item.title: Reply To: Can\'t build Sample App for iPhone
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

The sample app works right out of the box so there isn’t any work involved in compiling it; just open the project OpenEarsSampleApp.xcodeproj and press the run button on the Xcode UI. If you have to go through more steps than this, there might be an issue with your Xcode install or environment, so let me know what errors you encounter after downloading the distribution, unzipping it, and opening OpenEarsSampleApp.xcodeproj to run.
